thread.title: California, Education Department clash over transgender athletes in girls' sports
thread.title_full: California, Education Department clash over transgender athletes in girls' sports

author: Straight Arrow News
title: California, Education Department clash over transgender athletes in girls' sports
text:
California, Education Department clash over transgender athletes in girls’ sports Straight Arrow News Jul 8, 2025 Jul 8, 2025 Updated Jul 9, 2025 0 The Education Department is clashing with California over transgender athletes in girls’ sports. The agency says legal action is likely. As featured on Protesters rally against closure of largest gender-affirming care center for kids in US The Center for Transyouth Health and Development at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles will close its doors July 22. Latest video Facebook Twitter Bluesky WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save 0 Comments
Protesters rally against closure of largest gender-affirming care center for kids in US The Center for Transyouth Health and Development at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles will close its doors July 22.
